comment: These item bonus info texts are displayed in the FilterBlade Customizer tierList hoverBoxes. The texts are separate for section, baseType and (optional) unique name. The structure is: section (e.g. Uniques, Currency, ...) -> 'items' -> baseType (e.g. Simple Robe) -> property 1: 'text' (string to be displayed for the entire baseType), property 2: 'items' -> uniqueName (e.g. Tabula Rasa) -> 'text' (string to be displayed just for this one specific unique).

Divine Orb.text: Randomises the numeric values of the random modifiers on an item.

Elevated Sextant.text: Adds or rerolls a modifier on a Voidstone (Maven only drop)

Eternal Orb.text: Creates an imprint of an item for later restoration. The imprint can't be applied to Fractured Items (Ruthless only)

Fracturing Orb.text: Fracture a random modifier on a rare item with at least 4 modifiers, locking it in place.

Fracturing Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes a Fracturing Orb.

Hunter's Exalted Orb.text: Adds Hunter influence and a new Hunter modifier to a rare item (Al-Hezmin, The Hunter only drop)

Mirror of Kalandra.text: Creates a mirrored copy of an item.

Mirror Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes a Mirror of Kalandra.

Orb of Dominance.text: Removes one Influenced Modifier from an item with at least two Influenced Modifiers and upgrades another Influenced Modifier.

Prime Regrading Lens.text: Change the type of quality of a skill gem with quality to another random quality (Grand Heist drop only)

Sacred Crystallised Lifeforce.text: Used at the Horticrafting bench in your hideout for high tier crafting options (Oshabi, Avatar of the Grove drop only).

Secondary Regrading Lens.text: Change the type of quality of a support gem with quality to another random quality (Grand Heist drop only)

Tailoring Orb.text: Adds or replaces an enchantment on a body armour. This may reforge the body armour's sockets (Grand Heist drop only)

Tainted Divine Teardrop.text: Unpredictably raises or lowers the tier of each modifier on a corrupted rare item (Beyond drop only)

Tempering Orb.text: Adds or replaces an enchantment on a weapon. This may reforge the weapon's sockets (Grand Heist drop only)

Tainted Exalted Orb.text: Unpredictably adds or removes a modifier on a corrupted rare item (Beyond drop only)

Awakener's Orb.text: Destroys an item, applying its influence to another of the same item class. The second item is reforged as a rare item with both influence types and new modifiers (Sirus, Awakener of Worlds drop only)

Sacred Orb.text: Randomises the numeric values of base defences on an armour

Orb of Conflict.text: Unpredictably raise the strength of one Searing Exarch or Eater of Worlds modifier on an item and lower the strength of another. Lesser modifiers that have their strength lowered will be removed (Maven or Mavens Crucible drop only)

Crusader's Exalted Orb.text: Adds Crusader influence and a new Crusader modifier to a rare item (Baran, The Crusader drop only)

Redeemer's Exalted Orb.text: Adds Redeemer influence and a new Redeemer modifier to a rare item (Veritania, The Redeemer drop only)

Tainted Blessing.text: Can be placed in the Divine Font to allow enchantment of corrupted gloves, boots, helmets or belts(Izaro's Treasure drop only)

Exceptional Eldritch Ember.text: Adds an Exceptional Searing Exarch implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet replacing any existing implicit modifier (The Searing Exarch drop only)

Warlord's Exalted Orb.text: Adds Warlord influence and a new Warlord modifier to a rare item (Drox, The Warlord drop only)

Eldritch Chaos Orb.text: If The Searing Exarch is dominant, reroll prefix modifiers. If The Eater of Worlds is dominant, reroll suffix modifiers (Exarch, Eater spawned mobs drop only)

Exceptional Eldritch Ichor.text: Adds an Exceptional Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet replacing any existing implicit modifier (The Eater of Worlds drop only)

Eldritch Orb of Annulment.text: If The Searing Exarch is dominant, remove a prefix modifier. If The Eater of Worlds is dominant, remove a suffix modifier (Exarch, Eater spawned mobs or Eldritch horrors drop only)

Comprehensive Scouting Report.text: Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, adding additional mission options (Requires Planar Tactician Atlas node)

Tainted Orb of Fusing.text: Unpredictably adds or removes a link to the largest group of linked sockets on a corrupted item (Beyond drop only)

Exalted Orb.text: Augments a rare item with a new random modifier

Tainted Mythic Orb.text: Unpredictably either upgrades a corrupted item to unique rarity or destroys it (Beyond only)

Eldritch Exalted Orb.text: If The Searing Exarch is dominant, add a prefix modifier. If The Eater of Worlds is dominant, add a suffix modifier (Exarch, Eater spawned mobs or Eldritch horrors drop only)

Ancient Orb.text: Reforges a unique equipment as another of the same item class (Harbingers or Harbinger related rewards drop only)

Veiled Chaos Orb.text: Reforges a rare item with new random modifiers, including a Veiled modifier. Can only be used on items that can have a Veiled modifier.

Prismatic Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Resistance modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt (Metamorph or Metamorph related rewards drop only)

Unstable Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Critical modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt (Metamorph or Metamorph related rewards drop only)

Tainted Chaos Orb.text: Unpredictably either reforges a corrupted rare item with new random modifiers or removes all of its modifiers (Beyond drop only

Otherworldly Scouting Report.text: Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, including at least one Breachstone (Requires Expect the Unexpected Atlas Node)

Grand Eldritch Ember.text: Adds a Grand Searing Exarch implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet replacing any existing implicit modifier (Exarch influenced mobs or Black Star drop only)

Ritual Vessel.text: Stores the monsters slain for the first time from a completed Ritual Altar for future use (It can only be created by combining splinters)

Oil Extractor.text: Destroys an Anointed Item to recover one of the Oils that was used to apply that Anointment (Blight chest in Blight maps while Distilled Fungus Atlas node allocated)

Orb of Annulment.text: Removes a random modifier from an item (Harbingers or Harbinger related rewards drop only)

Blighted Scouting Report.text: Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, including at least one Blighted Map (Requires Expect the Unexpected Atlas Node)

Fertile Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Life and Mana modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt (Metamorph or Metamorph related rewards drop only)

Influenced Scouting Report.text: Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, including at least one Shaper Guardian, Elder Guardian, or Elderslayer Map (T14+ Map drop only)

Grand Eldritch Ichor.text: Adds a Grand Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet replacing any existing implicit modifier (Infinite Hunger drop only)

Tainted Chromatic Orb.text: Unpredictably reforges the colour of sockets on a corrupted item (Beyond drop only)

Accelerating Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Speed modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt (Metamorph or Metamorph related rewards drop only)

Singular Scouting Report.text: Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, including at least one Unique map.

Operative's Scouting Report.text: Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, granting missions with rewarding implicit modifiers (Requires Solidarity Atlas Node)

Stacked Deck.text: A stack of unknown divination cards.

Awakened Sextant.text: Adds or rerolls a modifier on a Voidstone.

Harbinger's Orb.text: Reforges a map item as another of a higher tier (Harbingers or Harbinger and Map Currency related rewards drop only)

Surveyor's Compass.text: Stores a Sextant Modifier in an item

Greater Eldritch Ember.text: Adds a Greater Searing Exarch implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet replacing any existing implicit modifier (Exarch influenced mob drop only)

Gemcutter's Prism.text: Improves the quality of a gem.

Enkindling Orb.text: Adds an enchantment to a utility flask that will improve it but prevent it from gaining charges during its effect.

Orb of Unmaking.text: Grants an atlas passive skill refund point

Exalted Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Exalted Orb.

Tempering Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Defence modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt.

Tainted Jeweller's Orb.text: Unpredictably adds or removes a socket on a corrupted item (Beyond drop only)

Tainted Armourer's Scrap.text: Randomises the quality of a corrupted armour (Beyond drop only)

Vaal Orb.text: Corrupts an item, modifying it unpredictably.

Intrinsic Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Attribute modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt (Metamorph or Metamorph related rewards drop only)

Greater Eldritch Ichor.text: Adds a Greater Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet replacing any existing implicit modifier (Eater influenced mob drop only)

Regal Orb.text: Upgrades a magic item to a rare item.

Noxious Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Physical and Chaos Damage modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt (Metamorph or Metamorph related rewards drop only)

Explorer's Scouting Report.text: Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, using uncompleted Maps where possible.

Vaal Scouting Report.text: Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, corrupting all non-Unique Maps.

Orb of Regret.text: Grants a passive skill refund point.

Turbulent Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Elemental Damage modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt (Metamorph or Metamorph related rewards drop only)

Orb of Scouring.text: Removes all modifiers from an item.

Blessed Orb.text: Randomises the numeric values of the implicit modifiers of an item.

Annulment Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Annulment (Harbingers or Harbinger and Map Currency related rewards drop only)

Instilling Orb.text: Adds an enchantment to a utility flask that will cause it to be used when certain conditions are met.

Glassblower's Bauble.text: Improves the quality of a flask.

Orb of Horizons.text: Reforges a map item as another of the same tier.

Abrasive Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Attack modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt (Metamorph or Metamorph related rewards drop only)

Lesser Eldritch Ember.text: Adds a Lesser Searing Exarch implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet replacing any existing implicit modifier.

Imbued Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Caster modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt (Metamorph or Metamorph related rewards drop only)

Orb of Fusing.text: Reforges the links between sockets on an item.

Cartographer's Chisel.text: Improves the quality of a map.

Tainted Blacksmith's Whetstone.text: Randomises the quality of a corrupted weapon (Beyond drop only)

Lesser Eldritch Ichor.text: Adds a Lesser Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet replacing any existing implicit modifier.

Chromatic Orb.text: Reforges the colour of sockets on an item.

Orb of Alchemy.text: Upgrades a normal item to a rare item.

Orb of Chance.text: Upgrades a normal item to a random rarity.

Engineer's Orb.text: Improves the quality of a Strongbox.

Orb of Alteration.text: Reforges a magic item with new random modifiers.

Jeweller's Orb.text: Reforges the number of sockets on an item.

Orb of Augmentation.text: Augments a magic item with a new random modifier.

Orb of Binding.text: Upgrades a normal item to a rare item with up to four linked sockets.

Blacksmith's Whetstone.text: Improves the quality of a weapon

Orb of Transmutation.text: Upgrades a normal item to a magic item

Armourer's Scrap.text: Improves the quality of an armour

Chaos Orb.text: Reforges a rare item with new random modifiers.

Delirious Scouting Report.text: Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, adding layers of Delirium to all non-Unique Maps (Requires Expect the Unexpected Atlas Node)

Crescent Splinter.text: Combine 10 Crescent Splinters to create The Maven's Writ (Maven Invitation drop only)

Blessing of Chayula.text: Upgrades a Chayula unique item or breachstone to a more powerful version (Chayula drop only)

Blessing of Uul-Netol.text: Upgrades a Uul-Netol unique item or breachstone to a more powerful version (Uul-Netol drop only)

Blessing of Esh.text: Upgrades a Esh unique item or breachstone to a more powerful version (Esh drop only)

Blessing of Tul.text: Upgrades a Tul unique item or breachstone to a more powerful version (Tul drop only)

Blessing of Xoph.text: Upgrades a Xoph unique item or breachstone to a more powerful version (Xoph drop only)

Burial Medallion.text: Brought to Dannig to refresh his vendor inventory.

Exotic Coinage.text: Brought to Tujen to refresh his vendor inventory.

Astragali.text: Brought to Gwennen to refresh her vendor inventory.

Ritual Splinter.text: Combine 100 Splinters to create a Ritual Vessel (Ritual drop only)

Scrap Metal.text: Brought to Rog to refresh his vendor inventory.

Ancient Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Ancient Orb (Harbingers or Harbinger related rewards drop only)

Bestiary Orb.text: Stores a Beast in an item (Can not drop, Sold by Einhar, Beastmaster)

Facetor's Lens.text: Adds stored experience to a gem, up to its maximum level (Harvest crafted drop only)

Harbinger's Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes a Harbinger's Orb (Harbingers or Harbinger and Map Currency related rewards drop only)

Alchemy Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Alchemy.

Alteration Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Alteration.

Binding Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Binding (Harbingers or Harbinger related rewards drop only)

Chaos Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes a Chaos Orb.

Horizon Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Horizons (Harbingers or Harbinger and Map Currency related rewards drop only)

Regal Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes a Regal Orb.

Engineer's Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Engineer's Orb (Harbingers or Harbinger and Map Currency related rewards drop only)

Transmutation Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Transmutation.

Primitive Chaotic Resonator.text: Single socket Resonator reforging a rare item using Fossils

Potent Chaotic Resonator.text: Two socket Resonator reforging a rare item using Fossils

Powerful Chaotic Resonator.text: Three socket Resonator reforging a rare item using Fossils

Prime Chaotic Resonator.text: Four socket Resonator reforging a rare item using Fossils

Primitive Alchemical Resonator.text: Single socket Resonator upgrading a normal item to a rare item using Fossils

Potent Alchemical Resonator.text: Two socket Resonator upgrading a normal item to a rare item using Fossils

Powerful Alchemical Resonator.text: Three socket Resonator upgrading a normal item to a rare item using Fossils

Prime Alchemical Resonator.text: Four socket Resonator upgrading a normal item to a rare item using Fossils

Aberrant Fossil.text: More Chaos modifiers, No Lightning modifiers

Aetheric Fossil.text: More Caster modifiers, Fewer Attack modifiers

Bloodstained Fossil.text: Corrupted, Has a Corrupted implicit modifier

Bound Fossil.text: More Minion, Aura or Curse modifiers

Corroded Fossil.text: More Physical Ailment or Chaos Ailment modifiers, No Elemental modifiers

Deft Fossil.text: More Critical modifiers, No Attribute modifiers

Dense Fossil.text: More Defence modifiers, No Life modifiers

Fractured Fossil.text: Creates a split copy. Cannot be used to split Influenced, Enchanted, Fractured, or Synthesised items.

Frigid Fossil.text: More Cold modifiers, No Fire modifiers

Fundamental Fossil.text: More Attribute modifiers, No Critical modifiers

Jagged Fossil.text: More Physical modifiers, No Chaos modifiers

Lucent Fossil.text: More Mana modifiers, No Speed modifiers

Metallic Fossil.text: More Lightning modifiers, No Physical modifiers

Prismatic Fossil.text: More Elemental modifiers, No Physical Ailment or Chaos Ailment modifiers

Pristine Fossil.text: More Life modifiers, No Defence modifiers

Sanctified Fossil.text: Numeric values are lucky, High Level modifiers are more common

Scorched Fossil.text: More Fire modifiers, No Cold modifiers

Serrated Fossil.text: More Attack modifiers, No Caster modifiers

Shuddering Fossil.text: More Speed modifiers, No mana modifiers

Tangled Fossil.text: Makes a random modifier type much more likely and prevents another random modifier type. Effects revealed once resonator is fully socketed.

Abyssal Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Abyss Items reward type

Amorphous Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Metamorph reward type

Armoursmith's Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Armour reward type

Blacksmith's Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Weapons reward type

Blighted Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Blight reward type

Cartographer's Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Map Items reward type

Diviner's Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Divination Cards reward type

Fine Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Currency Items reward type

Foreboding Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Harbinger Items reward type

Fossilised Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Fossils reward type

Fragmented Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Fragments reward type

Imperial Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Labyrinth Items reward type

Jeweller's Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Trinkets reward type

Obscured Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Breach Items reward type

Singular Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Unique Items reward type

Skittering Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Scarabs reward type

Thaumaturge's Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Gems reward type

Timeless Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Legion reward type

Whispering Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Essences reward type

Tainted Oil.text: Can be combined with other oils to enchant mirrored rings, amulets or blighted maps.

Reflective Oil.text: Can be combined with other oils to enchant corrupted rings, amulets or blighted maps.

Clear Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, 12% reduced Monster Movement Speed

Sepia Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, Towers deal 25% more Damage

Amber Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, 25% reduced Cost of Towers

Verdant Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, 45% increased Experience gain

Teal Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, Blight Monsters spawn 30% faster, Encounter duration is 50 seconds shorter

Azure Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, Varieties of Items contained in 5 Blight Chests are Lucky

Indigo Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, Up to 3 additional Blight Bosses

Violet Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, 25% chance for an additional Reward Chest

Crimson Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, Varieties of Items contained in 12 Blight Chests are Lucky

Black Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, 7% chance for Blight Chests to contain an additional Reward

Opalescent Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, Varieties of Items contained in 18 Blight Chests are Lucky

Silver Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps:  6% increased Pack size, 80% increased Quantity of Items

Golden Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps:  6% increased Pack size, 30% chance for Blight Chests to contain an additional Reward

Fine Incubator.text: Does not drop. Awards a Currency item.

Whispering Incubator.text: Does not drop. Awards an Essence item.

Blighted Incubator.text: Awards a Blight item. Usually blighted maps, oils or scarabs.

Cartographer's Incubator.text: Awards a Map item. Can grant special maps, if ItemLevel is 81 or higher.

Foreboding Incubator.text: Awards Currency Shards or a Harbinger item.

Gemcutter's Incubator.text: Does not drop. Awards a Quality Gem item.

Kalguuran Incubator.text: Awards an Expedition item. Usually expedition reroll currencies or scarabs

Maddening Incubator.text: Awards a Delirium item. Usually simulacrum splinters or delirium orbs

Morphing Incubator.text: Awards a Metamorph item. Usually catalysts.

Obscured Incubator.text: Awards a Breach item. Usually splinters or scarabs.

Thaumaturge's Incubator.text: Awards a high level Corrupted Gem or valuable Gem item. Usually a level 21 gem, an exceptional gem, a gem with 23 quality or a leveled/quality vaal gem!

Time-Lost Incubator.text: Does not drop. Awards a League-specific Unique item.

Celestial Armoursmith's Incubator.text: Awards a Shaper or Elder Armour item.

Celestial Blacksmith's Incubator.text: Awards a Shaper or Elder Weapon item.

Celestial Jeweller's Incubator.text: Awards a Shaper or Elder Trinket item (ring, amulet or belt).

Fragmented Incubator.text: Awards a Fragment item. Usually a Sacrifice fragment. Itemlevel 81+ incubators can rarely grant other fragments!

Mysterious Incubator.text: Awards the reward of another random incubator (likely bramblejack!).

Primal Incubator.text: Awards a Talisman item. Can rarely award unique talismans!

A Dab of Ink.text: Found in Academy, Museum, Scriptorium, The library

A Dusty Memory.text: Found in Altered Distant Memory, Augmented Distant Memory, Cortex, Rewritten Distant Memory, Twisted Distant Memory

A Familiar Call.text: Drops from Guardian of the Chimera.

A Modest Request.text: Drops from Eater of Souls, Nightmare's Omen, The Hallowed Husk, The High Templar

A Mother's Parting Gift.text: Found in The High Gardens, The Imperial Gardens

A Note in the Wind.text: Found in Desert, Desert Spring, Dry Sea, Dunes, The Oasis.

A Sea of Blue.text: Found in Crystal Ore, Grotto, Mineral Pools, Primordial Blocks.

A Stone Perfected.text: Found in Coves, Flooded Mine, Grotto, Peninsula, Vault, Waterways, Wharf.

Acclimatisation.text: Found in Desert, Desert Spring, Dry Sea, Dunes.

Akil's Prophecy.text: Found in The Temple of Atzoatl.

Alivia's Grace.text: Found in Ashen Wood, Bramble Valley, Dark Forest, Forbidden Woods, Jungle Valley, Lair, Ramparts, Spider Forest, Stagnation, Thicket, Tropical Island.

Alluring Bounty.text: Found in The Alluring Abyss, The Apex of Sacrifice

Ambitious Obsession.text: Drops from map bosses, Cold River, Sunken City, Fields, Cemetery, Infested Valley, Summit, Reef, Siege, Terrace.

Arrogance of The Vaal.text: Found in Ancient City, Sunken City, Vaal Pyramid.

Assassin's Favour.text: Found in Alleyways, Arcade, Bazaar, Port, The Marketplace, The Quay.

Atziri's Arsenal.text: Found in the Vaults of Atziri.

Audacity.text: Found in The Apex of Sacrifice.

Auspicious Ambitions.text: Drops from The Eater of Worlds, The Elder, The Maven, The Searing Exach.

Azyran's Reward.text: Found in Laboratory, Relic Chambers, Stagnation.

Baited Expectations.text: Found in Desert, Desert Spring, Dry Sea, Dunes.

Bijoux.text: Found in Crystal Ore, Dig, Excavation, Flooded Mine, Grotto.

Blind Venture.text: Found in Museum, Relic Chambers, The Reliquary.

Boon of Justice.text: Found in Chateau, Conservatory, Orchard, Plaza.

Boon of the First Ones.text: Found in Pit of the Chimera.

Boundless Realms.text: Found in Cold River, Temple, The Harbour Bridge, The Solaris Temple, The Twilight Temple.

Bowyer's Dream.text: Drops from Lord of the Ashen Arrow, Mirage of Bones, Steelpoint the Avenger, Stonebeak Battle Fowl.

Brother's Stash.text: Found in Cemetary, Grave Trough, Graveyard.

Buried Treasure.text: Found in Crystal Ore, Dig, Excavation, Flooded Mine, Geode, Grotto.

Burning Blood.text: Found in Forge of the Phoenix, Lava Chamber.

Call to the First Ones.text: Found in Bramble Valley, Dark Forest, Forbidden Woods, The Northern Forest, Thicket.

Cartographer's Delight.text: Found in The Foothills, The Harbour Bridge.

Chasing Risk.text: Drops from The Vaal Omnitect (Alva Temple).

Coveted Possession.text: Found in Bone Crypt, The Catacombs, The Ossuary.

Cursed Words.text: Found in Cemetary, Grave Trough, Graveyard.

Darker Half.text: Found in maps affected by Delirium and Simulacrum.

Death.text: Found in Bog, Marshes, Mud Geyser, The Karui Fortress.

Demigod's Wager.text: Drops from Basilica Boss and The Cleansing Light.

Dialla's Subjugation.text: Found in Cold River, Temple, The Solaris/Twilight Temple.

Divine Beauty.text: Drops from map bosses, Lava Chamber, Underground Sea(Maelstrom of Chaos), Mineral Pools.

Doedre's Madness.text: Drops from Doedre and similar boss models.

Dying Anguish.text: Found in Arsenal, Colonade, Ghetto, Port, Precinct, Promenade.

Polished Abyss Scarab.text: Area contains 1 additional Abyss, Abysses in Area spawn 50% increased Monsters

Gilded Abyss Scarab.text: Area contains 2 additional Abysses, Abysses in Area spawn 50% increased Monsters

Winged Abyss Scarab.text: Area contains 3 additional Abysses, Abysses in Area spawn 100% increased Monsters

Rusted Bestiary Scarab.text: Area contains an additional Red Beast

Polished Blight Scarab.text: Encounter contains up to 1 additional boss

Gilded Blight Scarab.text: Encounter has +1 additional boss and 50% for additional reward from chests

Winged Blight Scarab.text: Encounter has +1 additional boss, 50% for additional reward from chests and lanes have additional reward chest

Polished Breach Scarab.text: Area contains an additional Breach, Breaches contain an additional boss' clasped hand

Gilded Breach Scarab.text: Area contains an additional Breach, Breaches contain an additional boss' clasped hand. Hands drop double splinters

Winged Breach Scarab.text: Area contains 2 additional Breaches, Breaches contain an additional boss' clasped hand. Hands drop double splinters

Rusted Divination Scarab.text: 50% More divination cards found in area

Polished Divination Scarab.text: 100% More divination cards found in area

Gilded Divination Scarab.text: 150% More divination cards found in area

Winged Divination Scarab.text: 250% More divination cards found in area

Rusted Elder Scarab.text: 30% More rare Elder items found in area

Polished Elder Scarab.text: 60% More rare Elder items found in area

Gilded Elder Scarab.text: 90% More rare Elder items found in area

Winged Elder Scarab.text: 150% More rare Elder items found in area

Rusted Expedition Scarab.text: Area contains an additional Expedition Encounter

Polished Expedition Scarab.text: Expedition Encounters have 20% more explosives and 25% additional runic monster markers

Gilded Expedition Scarab.text: Expedition Encountershave 20% more explosives and 50% additional runic monster markers

Winged Expedition Scarab.text: Expedition Encounters have 20% more explosives, 50% additional runic monster markers and +1 to Remanant suffix

Rusted Legion Scarab.text: Area contains an additional Legion Encounter

Polished Legion Scarab.text: Area contains an additional Legion Encounter, Each Legion contains a war hoard

Gilded Legion Scarab.text: Area contains an additional Legion Encounter, Each Legion contains a war hoard and general

Winged Legion Scarab.text: Area contains 2 additional Legion Encounters, Each Legion contains a war hoard and general

Polished Metamorph Scarab.text: Area contains Metamorph monsters, Bosses which drop an itemised sample drop an additional sample

Gilded Metamorph Scarab.text: Area contains Metamorph monsters, All metamorph monsters have rewards, Bosses which drop an itemised sample drop an additional sample

Winged Metamorph Scarab.text: Area contains Metamorph monsters, All metamorph monsters have rewards, Bosses which drop an itemised sample drop 2 additional samples

Gilded Reliquary Scarab.text: 150% More unique items found in area

Winged Reliquary Scarab.text: 250% More unique items found in area
